pr_title: Test managed executor from CDI producer used by ServletContainerInitializer

timeline.message: Test managed executor from CDI producer used by ServletContainerInitializer

timeline.bodyText: Are these empty tags needed?  <interceptors> and <decorators>

replies.author: njr-11
